text: made so much turkey stock in my instant pot this thanksgiving
I can't wait to get mine. I am so stoked.
turkey stock is my favorite part of thanksgiving
i made matzo ball soup and congee with turkey stock and they were both A+
nice, was thinking about  making some congee
OH MY GOSH. I love Matzo ball soup. It's my favorite
made the matzo ball with turkey schmaltz and it was so tender and delicious
i cheated and used the mix tho.  maybe next year i'll try from scratch
the congee truly helps normalize the stomach after overeating... might become a yearly tradition!
I did a pot full o potatoes on the rack, over a cup of water. Mashing them  was so much cleaner than boiled potatoes that get starchy puddles all over the place.
(instant pot related, I wasn't in the channel I thought)
nice, i’ve been “baking” sweet potatoes in the IP lately its stupid easy
i did “roasted" potatoes and used lamb stock instead of water and ummmmmmm
so i have a bunch of turkey leftover, what should i do with it in my IP?
not sure you want to pressure cook already-cooked turkey, but IP something else and add the turkey after
